casebody.data:
Paula MARTIN, Widow, and Brandon Martin, Minor Child (By and Through His Guardian ad Litem Paula Martin), of William D. Martin, Deceased Employee, Plaintiffs,
v.
ORANGE WATER AND SEWER AUTHORITY, Employer, NCIRMA, Carrier, Defendants. No. COA17-242 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: October 17, 2017

AFFIRMED.
